original_text: And all they that were about them strengthened their hands with vessels of silver, with gold, with goods, and with beasts, and with precious things, beside all that was willingly offered.
korean_text: 그 사면 사람들이 은 그릇과 금과 물품들과 짐승과 보물로 돕고 그 외에도 예물을 기쁘게 드렸더라

sentences.original_text: And all they that were about them
strengthened their hands with vessels of silver
with gold, with goods, and with beasts
beside all that was willingly offered
